mapper.select: select distinct name,scid,is211,is985,isDoubleFirstClass,rank from gaokao where spname regexp #{spname} or spname regexp #{subject} or spname regexp #{major} order by rank limit #{page},#{size}
select count(distinct name) from gaokao where spname regexp #{spname} or spname regexp #{subject} or spname regexp #{major}
select * from gaokao where min between #{score}-40 and #{score}+5 and local_province_name=#{province} and local_type_name=#{sort}

select name ,count(*),spname,rank FROM gaokao where min between #{score}-5 and #{score}+10 AND areaname REGEXP '${province1}|${province2}|${province3}' and local_province_name =#{area} and local_type_name=#{sort} and type regexp '${type1}|{type2}|{type3}|{type4}|{type5}|{type6}' GROUP BY NAME HAVING COUNT(*)>=6 ORDER BY rank

select name ,count(*),spname,rank FROM gaokao where min between #{score}-30 and #{score}-6 AND areaname REGEXP '${province1}|${province2}|${province3}' and local_province_name =#{area} and local_type_name=#{sort} and type regexp '${type1}|{type2}|{type3}|{type4}|{type5}|{type6}' GROUP BY NAME HAVING COUNT(*)>=6 ORDER BY rank

select name ,count(*),spname,rank FROM gaokao where min between #{score}-70 and #{score}+-31 AND areaname REGEXP '${province1}|${province2}|${province3}' and local_province_name =#{area} and local_type_name=#{sort} and type regexp '${type1}|{type2}|{type3}|{type4}|{type5}|{type6}' GROUP BY NAME HAVING COUNT(*)>=6 ORDER BY rank
select * from gaokao where min between #{score}-5 and #{score}+10 and name=#{school} and local_province_name =#{area} and local_type_name=#{sort} order by min desc
select * from gaokao where min between #{score}-30 and #{score}-6 and name=#{school} and local_province_name =#{area} and local_type_name=#{sort} order by min desc
select * from gaokao where min between #{score}-70 and #{score}-31 and name=#{school} and local_province_name =#{area} and local_type_name=#{sort} order by min desc
